text.div:
VhDir Healthcare Service Characteristic

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the characteristics of a healthcare service.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/vhdir/CodeSystem/healthcareservice-characteristic

name: VhDirHealthcareServiceCharacteristic
title: VhDir Healthcare Service Characteristic
description: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate the characteristics of a healthcare service.
